title: Bug 136966When set an alias on a column, the column can not be used in the cascading parameter
description: Description:When set an alias on a column, the column can not be used in the cascading parameterSteps to reproduce:1. new a datasource and a dataset2. set an alias on a column3. new a cascading parameter, set the column with an alias as the values columnActual result:the column can not be used in the cascading parameter
